name: UQAT Game Jam 2016
description:
Game made during the UQAT Game Jam 2016. Ironically, the name is also called UQAT Game Jam 2016 since we had to break the 4th wall and we decided to make a game where you control one of the creators during the jam. During the Jam you have to kill 5 other Jamers to win the contest.

Unfortunately, some of the interactions with the objects in the game don't work, so it is impossible to finish it.

All the NPCs are randomly generated (color, hair, glasses, etc.).

Created by a team that never worked together before : Maxime Flageole, Carlyne Poizeau, Jean-François Morin, Jean Iskiw, Kris Brice.
